name: Bee LinkedUp
description:
Bee LinkedUp is a multilevel casual gaming wonder which not only delivers highly riveting game play, fabulous artistic works, fascinating music and sound effects but also allows you to immersively learn some serious lessons for life and business: courage, action-oriented, strategy and tenacity with tons of fun!

The gameplay is straightforward but to win at each level is not easy at all! You need careful thinking, decisive and fast actions, most importantly the right strategy to win. You can also appreciate the value of relentlessly trying and some pure luck.

Come experience this wonderful world of bees and honeycomb linked up with honey!
